segments.text: Excuse me , where are the canned goods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The counter is at the end of the aisle . They are kept in the ice chest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you.And where can I buy some delicatessen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The delicatessen department is on the second floor .
segments.speaker: S2
